name: HTML and custom code demo
description:
Buzzy lets you build working apps straight from Figma.


This is a Figma file that has been marked up with the Buzzy Figma plugin to demonstrate the Buzzy 'HTML' field type. Insert your own custom code into a Buzzy app: charts, data-driven widgets and more. Your code can communicate with both Buzzy and external data-sources.


- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Video

Demo file walkthru & setup

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -


Grab this file, install the plugin, and follow the included setup steps - you'll have a working app in a browser. Use this file as a reference for creating and publishing your own custom code widgets in Buzzy.


New to Buzzy? Try the 'Getting Started' guides
